Label: Purpose
Is Part Of: To link items that are a subset of another item (e.g. a page in a book, or a map in an atlas).

Label: Entry Guidelines
Is Part Of: Make a parent record to group records together. Enter the ID of the parent record(s).

Label: Commentary
Is Part Of: This is one of several fields that describe how records relate to each other. To link to a collection (rather than a book or atlas), see [Member Of](../ogm-aardvark/#member-of).
